meta.title: Is it Vegan? - Vegan Check
meta.description: Are you unsure whether a product is vegan or not? With VeganCheck.me you can scan the bar code of an item while shopping and check whether it is vegan or not and that without a lot of other unnecessary information! Try it out now!

footer.credits: Made with by Philip Brembeck & JokeNetwork
footer.legal: Privacy Policy / Terms of use / Imprint / API

prompt.desc: Install VeganCheck and always scan products and check if they're vegan!

other.offline: You are currently offline. VeganCheck.me only works with a functioning internet-connection.
other.timeoutfinal: The request took too long. Please try again.

results.invalid: Barcode cannot be empty or include special characters.
results.notindb: This product is not in our database yet.
results.add: Do you want to add it?
results.missinginfo: We do not have enough info on this product yet.
results.checkingredients: The products ingredients were processed and checked automatically. Please check the ingredients yourself to be sure.

modal.palmoil_desc: Palm-oil has an extremly harmful impact on the planet. It is the major driver of deforestation of some of the most biodiverse forests, destroying the natural habitats of already endangered animals. Because of this, we'd recommend to not buy any products that contain palm-oil. Sadly, there are still many products out there which include palm oil.
modal.nutriscore_desc: The Nutriscore indicates the nutritional profile of a product in traffic light form. However, the Nutriscore is not considered accurate and should not be used as a reference.
modal.processed_desc:
This message means that the ingredients of the product have been checked by the VeganCheck.me Ingredients API and have been automatically classified as vegan or non-vegan.
The ingredients are provided in each case by the indicated source.
We do not make any claims about the accuracy or timeliness of the ingredients or the review criteria.
Sometimes manufacturers change the ingredients of their product so that it is no longer vegan, for example by adding milk powder.
Please double check the ingredients of the product to be sure.
modal.licenses_desc: VeganCheck.me uses different databases and APIs to gather information about a product. The information is licensed under the following licenses:

ingredients.title: Vegan Ingredient Checker
ingredients.subtitle: Check if the Ingredients of a product are vegan!
ingredients.error: Ingredients-list cannot be empty or include special characters and have to be comma seperated!

donate.vendor: The payment process will be completed on PayPal.

language: This page is only available in English and German.
germanonly: This page is only available in German.
tos:
Use of "VeganCheck.me"

The use of the site "VeganCheck.me" is free of charge. The distribution of the contents or our services against payment is strictly prohibited. Automated queries are also prohibited and may only be performed using the API.
We reserve the right to change, reduce, expand or disable our services at any time.

Processing of entered texts and numbers

On our website, barcodes or ingredients of a product can be entered in text fields. This is necessary to provide our service in its entirety. The data entry is completely voluntary.
Only barcodes or ingredients may be entered in the named text fields; the entry or transmission of personal data of any kind is strictly prohibited.

Personal data is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable living individual. Different pieces of information, which collected together can lead to the identification of a particular person, also constitute personal data.?

Disclaimer

We assume no liability for the accuracy of the product information and ingredient lists offered and for the availability of our service.
